amendment.description: Amendment prohibits USDA and NFS from issuing restrictions and regulations on hunting and recreational fishing in the Mark Twain National Forest.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 9 printed in House Report 114-429 to prohibit USDA and NFS from issuing restrictions and regulations on hunting and recreational fishing in the Mark Twain National Forest.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (MO) amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 232 - 173 (Roll no. 95).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Smith (MO).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Smith (MO) amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 232 - 173 (Roll no. 95).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
